name: tester
description: Checks if articles are write in right way

scripts.build: mkdir -p ../static/api && touch ../static/api/posts.json && sed -i '/type": "module/d' node_modules/@gerhobbelt/markdown-it-html5-media/package.json && node -r esm build.js && cp _headers ../static && cp -r ../wpisy ../static/files

author: Patryk Niedźwiedziński
